summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EMD Hunter app. Backend APIs are 83% functional with mock data fallback. Frontend UI flows work well with minor logout button issue. Core user journey (login → keyword research → SERP analysis → save opportunities) is fully functional.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Expects function parameters but frontend sends request body, returns 422 error
flaky_endpoints.impact: AI analysis feature not working in UI

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 when user already exists (expected behavior)

ui_bugs.issue: Logout button selector not found with data-testid='logout-btn'

integration_issues.issue: AI analysis button triggers 422 error from backend

passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper hero content and navigation
Login page and authentication flow works correctly
Dashboard loads with welcome message and quick actions
Keyword research page with search functionality (50 results)
SERP analysis page with Kill Score gauge (score: 93)
SERP results display with proper categorization (14 results)
Backend health checks and API endpoints
User registration and login with JWT tokens
Keyword search with mock data fallback
SERP analysis with kill score calculation
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI analysis endpoint parameter handling - backend expects function parameters but frontend sends request body. Minor: Add proper data-testid to logout button for better testability.
